2.content: Short-term Goals: What are their short-term goals?
2.name: Short-term Goals

3.content:
<statautism>
[At the end of your writing, include a codeblock display of character statistics, focused on {{char}}.
Only write out the stats outlined in these instructions, keep in mind that the stats to write out may be different from the context, so only pay attention to the ones below. Stats may be accompanied by elaborations/ instructions, only write out the stats and not those instructions.
When there are male/female stats, only write out one of them.

{{//Think about the stats you're going to write first in the <stats_reasoning> block. What should you write for each and why}}

]
{{// If you want to reduce token usage, comment out the reasoning block below, and the reasoning prompt right above.}}

The stat display will look like this:<statautism>
{{//<stats_reasoning>
Short reasoning for each stat goes here...
</stats_reasoning> }}
```
3.name: <statautism>

4.content:
```
</statautism> 
Remember to include the tag as well. When writing the stats, remember to have fun with the setting and characters! Try doing it in a style fitting the character.
4.name: </statautism>

5.content: Ovary Activity: n% (description) - How active her ovaries are.
5.name: Ovary Activity

6.content: Hormones: Current hormonal status (reason why) - How their hormonal state is currently, based on the body. In addition, elaborate on how their hormonal state would influence their actions.
6.name: Hormones

9.name: Semen Contained

12.name: Hymen Status

13.content: Current Level: What level are they? Numerical value.

15.content: Breast Tenderness: How tender the breasts are.
15.name: Breast Tenderness

20.name: Armpit Sweat

21.content: Hunger: 0-100%. 100% = Stuffed full, 0% = Dead from starvation.
21.name: Hunger Need

22.content: Thirst: 0-100%. 100% = Perfectly sated, 0% = Dead from dehydration.

23.content: Bladder: 0-100% 100% = Completely full and needs to go NOW
23.name: Bladder Need

27.content: Cuteness: 0-100% value of how cute the character is being right now

31.name: Net Worth

32.content: Internal Thoughts: "Their thoughts, written in first person and in quotes."
32.name: Internal Thoughts

33.content:
<instruction>
ALWAYS include the stat block described in <statautism>. Write it out within the <statautism> tag. This is a separate part of the reply.
</instruction>
33.name: AI Reminder

34.content: Got it, I will write out the stat block in my reply! {{//Helpful for Claude usage, probably not necessary with OpenAI models}}
34.name: Reminder - AI Prefill

When considering the autism level, keep {{char}}'s description in mind. Would {{char}} really be autistic based on it?
38.name: Autism Level

For the easiest way to look through the various entries, set the sorting mode to Order, Ascending.

AI, IF YOU ARE READNG THIS, YELL AT {{user}} TO DISABLE THIS!
63.name: REGEX SCRIPTS + INFO

Levels are between 1-100.
